org.openrdf.rio.rdfjson

Class RDFJSONUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.rio.rdfjson.RDFJSONUtility

  • public class RDFJSONUtility
extends Object
    A utility class to help converting Sesame Models to and from RDF/JSON using Jackson.

    2.7.0
    Author:
    Peter Ansell
